Description:
Detects any deletion of entries in ".*\shell\open\command" registry keys.
These registry keys might have been used for COM hijacking activities by a threat actor or an attacker and the deletion could indicate steps to remove its tracks.


Author: Roberto Rodriguez (Cyb3rWard0g), OTR (Open Threat Research)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Removal of Potential COM Hijacking Registry Keys
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where ((event_type = 'deletekey' and target_object like '%\shell\open\command') and  not (process_path = 'c:\windows\system32\svchost.exe' or process_path = 'c:\program files (x86)\microsoft office\root\integration\integrator.exe' or (process_path like '%\dropbox.exe' and target_object like '%\dropbox.%') or (process_path like '%peazip%' and target_object like '%\peazip.%') or (process_path like 'c:\program files (x86)\java\%' and process_path like '%\installer.exe' and target_object like '%\classes\wow6432node\clsid\{4299124f-f2c3-41b4-9c73-9236b2ad0e8f}%') or (process_path like '%\appdata\local\temp\wireshark_uninstaller.exe' and target_object like '%\wireshark-capture-file\%') or ((process_path like 'c:\program files\opera\%' or process_path like 'c:\program files (x86)\opera\%') and process_path like '%\installer.exe') or (process_path like '%\everything.exe' and target_object like '%\everything.%') or process_path like 'c:\windows\installer\msi%' or ((process_path like 'c:\program files\common files\microsoft shared\clicktorun\%' or process_path like 'c:\program files\common files\microsoft shared\clicktorun\updates\%') and process_path like '%\officeclicktorun.exe')))
